00002 /*! zcovector*zrovector operator */
00003 inline _zgematrix operator*(const zcovector& covec, const zrovector& rovec)
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator*(const zcovector&, const zrovector&)"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010   zgematrix newmat(covec.L, rovec.L);
00011   for(long i=0; i<newmat.m; i++){
00012     for(long j=0; j<newmat.n; j++){
00013       newmat(i,j) =covec(i)*rovec(j);
00014     }
00015   }
00016   
00017   return _(newmat);
00018 }
